CIRCE (Community of Italian Researchers Connecting on Extreme Value Statistics). 

<br> 

## Aim and community coordinators 

The aim of the community is to create a space for Italian researchers interested in Extreme Value Statistics to network and interact. It was established in January 2026 during the [first CIRCE meeting](meetings/meeting20060126.qmd). 

Currently the Community is coordinated by 

- [Simone Padoan](https://dec.unibocconi.eu/faculty/simone-padoan)
- [Ilaria Prosdocimi](https://www.unive.it/data/people/19166744)
- [Luca Trapin](https://sites.google.com/site/lucatrapin/home)


## How to join  

You can email any of the coordinators to be added to the community.
